name: Ball Fighter 2009
description:
Ball Fighter was my first ever game back in 2009. It was intended to be a hyper-realistic simulation of a ball that "bounces" around to squish people, which is why I spent a lot of time adding small little details like bouncing off of surfaces.

When I first published this to YoYoGames, one comment in particular said something along the lines of, "This is probably the worst game on this site."

Defeat the Bosses!

Mersatan: Half-Satan, half-mermaid. He shoots a fireball at you. It does no damage.

Boss Fight #2: Unnamed colossal beast with two arms that will destroy you in one hit.

Dragon: A giant, mighty dragon who is terrorizing humans. Poses no threat to you, but must be stopped at all costs.

Controls:

When on the red screen, press Escape. Use arrow keys to move around.
